attributes.action: XL Bully Excemption - More time to get excemptions
attributes.additional_details:
A large majority of xl bullies have not been excempted due to owners being in hospital / unaware of the timescale 
Another deadline to excempt an xl bully should be given.
attributes.background: Allow people unable to get an excemption previously due to personal reasons ie hospital to be able to apply for one

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Delay the ban on rehoming and owning XL Bully dogs for 18 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650474
